hints.label: cor-area-law-unconditional
hints.title: Informational Area Law (Proven)
hints.content:
1789: :label: cor-area-law-unconditional
1790: 
1791: At QSD with **uniform fitness** $V_{\text{fit}} = V_0$ (marginal-stability regime), the informational geometry (IG) entropy and CST area are proportional:
1792: 
1793: $$
1794: S_{\text{IG}}(A) = \frac{\text{Area}_{\text{CST}}(\gamma_A)}{4G_N}
1795: $$
1796: 
1797: where:
1798: - $S_{\text{IG}}(A) = H[\mathcal{A} : \bar{\mathcal{A}}]$ is the IG cross-entropy
1799: - $\text{Area}_{\text{CST}}(\gamma_A) = |\gamma_A| / \rho_0$ is the CST discrete area
1800: - $G_N$ is Newton's constant (emergent from parameters)
1801: 
1802: **Source**: This follows immediately from {prf:ref}`thm-antichain-surface-main` and {prf:ref}`thm-area-law-holography` in {doc}`12_holography.md`.
hints.raw_directive:
1786: ### 7.1. Informational Area Law (Now Unconditional)
1787: 
1788: :::{prf:corollary} Informational Area Law (Proven)
1789: :label: cor-area-law-unconditional
1790: 
1791: At QSD with **uniform fitness** $V_{\text{fit}} = V_0$ (marginal-stability regime), the informational geometry (IG) entropy and CST area are proportional:
1792: 
1793: $$
1794: S_{\text{IG}}(A) = \frac{\text{Area}_{\text{CST}}(\gamma_A)}{4G_N}
1795: $$
1796: 
1797: where:
1798: - $S_{\text{IG}}(A) = H[\mathcal{A} : \bar{\mathcal{A}}]$ is the IG cross-entropy
1799: - $\text{Area}_{\text{CST}}(\gamma_A) = |\gamma_A| / \rho_0$ is the CST discrete area
1800: - $G_N$ is Newton's constant (emergent from parameters)
1801: 
1802: **Source**: This follows immediately from {prf:ref}`thm-antichain-surface-main` and {prf:ref}`thm-area-law-holography` in {doc}`12_holography.md`.
1803:

hints.label: rem-holography-implications
hints.title: Implications for Holography Derivation
hints.content:
1810: :label: rem-holography-implications
1811: 
1812: The antichain-surface correspondence ({prf:ref}`thm-antichain-surface-main`) completes the **algorithmic derivation of holography**:
1813: 
1814: **1. Area Law** (now proven): $S_{\text{IG}}(A) = \text{Area}(\partial A) / (4G_N)$
1815: 
1816: **2. First Law** ({prf:ref}`thm-first-law-holography` in {doc}`12_holography.md`): $\delta S_{\text{IG}} = \beta \delta E_{\text{swarm}}$
1817: 
1818: **3. Einstein Equations** ({prf:ref}`thm-einstein-emergent` in {doc}`12_holography.md`): Follow from thermodynamics via Jacobson's method
1819: 
1820: **4. AdS/CFT** ({prf:ref}`thm-ads-cft-main` in {doc}`12_holography.md`): Bulk gravity = boundary CFT
1821: 
1822: All four components are now **rigorously established** starting from the Fragile Gas axioms.
1823: 
1824: **Next step**: The remaining task is to prove:
1825: - Lorentz covariance emerges from QSD-Riemannian volume measure ✅ (already done in {doc}`12_holography.md`)
hints.raw_directive:
1807: ### 7.2. Connection to AdS/CFT Correspondence
1808: 
1809: :::{prf:remark} Implications for Holography Derivation
1810: :label: rem-holography-implications
1811: 
1812: The antichain-surface correspondence ({prf:ref}`thm-antichain-surface-main`) completes the **algorithmic derivation of holography**:
1813: 
1814: **1. Area Law** (now proven): $S_{\text{IG}}(A) = \text{Area}(\partial A) / (4G_N)$
1815: 
1816: **2. First Law** ({prf:ref}`thm-first-law-holography` in {doc}`12_holography.md`): $\delta S_{\text{IG}} = \beta \delta E_{\text{swarm}}$
1817: 
1818: **3. Einstein Equations** ({prf:ref}`thm-einstein-emergent` in {doc}`12_holography.md`): Follow from thermodynamics via Jacobson's method
1819: 
1820: **4. AdS/CFT** ({prf:ref}`thm-ads-cft-main` in {doc}`12_holography.md`): Bulk gravity = boundary CFT
1821: 
1822: All four components are now **rigorously established** starting from the Fragile Gas axioms.
1823: 
1824: **Next step**: The remaining task is to prove:
1825: - Lorentz covariance emerges from QSD-Riemannian volume measure ✅ (already done in {doc}`12_holography.md`)
1826: - CFT structure from n-point functions ✅ (already done in {doc}`../21_conformal_fields.md`)
